title: [1.9/1.7.10][视野控制-Fov Control]速度buff再也不难受♂了
author: 超级大帅逼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 超级大帅逼 于 2017-7-25 10:34 编辑 

这个mod就是让你的视野保持正常， 拉弓和缓慢不会放大，疾跑、飞行、飞行疾跑和速度buff不会广角



有的人用了这个mod疾跑的时候(或者是其他)肯定会有点不习惯对不对

在config文件夹中找到 fovcontrol.cfg 或者在游戏mods选项设置:
    (全部默认值是为0，以下是mc原版设置值，不需要的设置=0.0)

     拉弓时的缩放
 # Field of view decreased up to this amount when using a bow [range: 0.0 ~ 0.5, default: 0.0]
    S:"Bow Zoom Modifier"=0.1

     飞行时的广角
    # Field of view increased by this amount when flying [range: 0.0 ~ 0.5, default: 0.0]
    S:"Flying Modifier"=0.1

     缓慢debuff时的缩放
    # Field of view decreased by this amount when under the effects of slowness [range: 0.0 ~ 0.5, default: 0.0]
    S:"Slowness Modifier"=0.075

     疾跑时的广角
    # Field of view increased by this amount when sprinting [range: 0.0 ~ 0.5, default: 0.0]
    S:"Sprint Modifier"=0.15

     速度buff时的广角
    # Field of view increased by this amount when under the effects of swiftness [range: 0.0 ~ 0.5, default: 0.0]
    S:"Swiftness Modifier"=0.2


值当然也不要调太大了，不然会拉弓视野缩得这么小

疾跑视野这么大



这个mod的不足是不能根据速度buff（缓慢debuff）的等级来增大视野的大小
比如说你速度1和速度255都调的那个视野大小
需要自己手动调整视野(游戏自带的调节视野也是可以的)

已知BUG：
龙之研究mod的龙之护腿调了速度后视野会缩得很小

欢迎提交更多BUG


作者原文：By default this will disable any fov change entirely. You can tweak 5 fov changing modifiers to your liking using the in-game config editor or by editing the config file.  
Minecraft defaults / Config setting:  

When flying 1.1 / 0.1 

When sprinting 1.15 / 0.15 

When using a bow at max draw 0.85 / 0.15 

Under the effects of slowness 0.925 / 0.075

Under the effects of swiftness 1.1-1.2 / 0.1-0.2  

The mod starts at 1.0, which is your normal fov, and cumulatively increases / decreases your fov based on player state and your desired config settings.  

Minecraft is hard-coded to a max of 1.5 and min of 0.1 fov modifier.  

Each config setting has a range from 0.0 to 0.5. 

This should be a client-side only mod, but I haven't setup a dedicated server instance to confirm it isn't causing any problems.
